name: Crash The Rocket
description:
Crash The Rocket. That's right, your goal is to crash this rocket. 

Buuuuuuuuuuut, that's only if you can make it past a figurative MINEFIELD of literal MAGNETS, trying to drive your rocket out of control.

And did we mention there's a time limit? Yeah, there's a time limit, cause your rocket only has a short fuse before it goes BOOM!
